    def between(sha1, sha2 = nil)
      dirty_log

    end

    def each
      check_log
      @commits.each do |c|
        yield c
      end
    end

to_s()

[Source]

# File lib/git/log.rb, line 48
    def to_s
      self.map { |c| c.to_s }.join("\n")
    end
